data.description: Wrapper for queued downloads via Net::Curl
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a glue module for AnyEvent, Net::Curl and Moose. It is
    supposed to be used extending primitive classes the Moose way
    instead of overriding a couple of pre-defined callbacks (pure
    AnyEvent way). Thus, it is more flexible than the similar
    AnyEvent::Curl::Multi. Also, HTTP::Response encapsulation is
    optional, so AnyEvent::Net::Curl::Queued is faster, also.
